line.originaltext: 3 bone-in chicken breast halves, skinless
1 (14.5 ounce) can chicken broth
3 potatoes
1 yellow onion
3 stalks celery
2 tablespoons vegetable oil
2 tablespoons all-purpose flour
2 cups frozen mixed vegetables
1 to taste salt and pepper to taste
1/4 teaspoon garlic powder
1 (9 inch) frozen prepared pie crust, thawed
Wash chicken breasts in water and then place in a pot with water just to cover the chicken add some salt and pepper and garlic powder.
Wash chicken breasts in water and then place in a pot with water just to cover the chicken add some salt and pepper and garlic powder.
Wash chicken breasts in water and then place in a pot with water just to cover the chicken add some salt and pepper and garlic powder.
line.annotation: cook(ing11, t0, ing12, "boiled chicken", "boil, turn off heat and cover")

line.originaltext: Let cool in the pot.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Wash and cut potatoes into bite size pieces and boil till almost fork tender.
Wash and cut potatoes into bite size pieces and boil till almost fork tender.
line.annotation: cut(ing2, t2, ing13, "cut potatoes", "into bite-sized pieces")

line.originaltext: Wash and cut potatoes into bite size pieces and boil till almost fork tender.
line.annotation: cook(ing13, t0, ing14, "boiled potatoes", "till almost fork tender")

line.originaltext: Drain and set aside.
line.annotation: do(ing14, t0, ing15, "drained boiled potatoes", "drain and set aside")

line.originaltext: Wash celery and cut to bite-size pieces.
line.annotation: cut(ing4, t2, ing16, "cut celery", "cut into bite-size pieces")

line.originaltext: Cut onion to bite-size pieces.
line.annotation: cut(ing3, t2, ing17, "cut onion", "into bite-sized pieces")

line.originaltext: In a large heavy skillet, over medium heat, saute celery and onion with 2 tablespoons oil, for 5 to 8 minutes.
In a large heavy skillet, over medium heat, saute celery and onion with 2 tablespoons oil, for 5 to 8 minutes.
line.annotation: combine({ing16, ing17, ing5}, ing18, "oiled celery and onion", "")

line.originaltext: In a large heavy skillet, over medium heat, saute celery and onion with 2 tablespoons oil, for 5 to 8 minutes.
line.annotation: cook(ing18, t3, ing19, "sauteed celery and onion", "saute for 5 to 8 minutes over medium heat")

line.originaltext: Add the frozen vegetables and cook another 5 minutes.
Add the frozen vegetables and cook another 5 minutes.
Add flour and cook about 30 seconds.
Add flour and cook about 30 seconds.
line.annotation: cook(ing22, t3, ing23, "floured veggies", "cook for 30 seconds")

line.originaltext: Add chicken broth and bring to a boil.
line.annotation: combine({ing1, ing23}, ing24, "broth and veggies", "bring to boil")

line.originaltext: After it has become thick, add potatoes.
line.annotation: chefcheck(ing24,"when it becomes thick, add potatoes")

line.originaltext: After it has become thick, add potatoes.
Remove chicken from pot and cut into bite-size pieces and add to vegetable mixture.
Remove chicken from pot and cut into bite-size pieces and add to vegetable mixture.
line.annotation: cut(ing12, t2, ing26, "cut chicken", "into bite-sized pieces")

line.originaltext: Remove chicken from pot and cut into bite-size pieces and add to vegetable mixture.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
line.annotation: chefcheck(ing27,"may add more salt and pepper to taste")

line.originaltext: Pour mixture into a 9 inch deep dish pie plate and cover with pie shell.
Pour mixture into a 9 inch deep dish pie plate and cover with pie shell.
Pour mixture into a 9 inch deep dish pie plate and cover with pie shell.
Make sure you crimp the edges of the pie shell to the plate so no juices spill in oven.
line.annotation: do(ing28, t4, ing29, "crimped uncooked pie", "crimp edges of pie shell")

line.originaltext: Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 45 minutes or until pie shell is cooked and golden brown.
line.annotation: cook(ing29, t1, ing30, "baked pie", "for 45 minutes or until pie shell is golden brown")

line.originaltext: Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 45 minutes or until pie shell is cooked and golden brown.
